Module com.example.poo
Package com.example.poo.weapons_bullets

Class AimBullet

java.lang.Object
com.example.poo.spaceEntity.Entity
com.example.poo.weapons_bullets.BulletEntity
com.example.poo.weapons_bullets.HomingBullet
com.example.poo.weapons_bullets.AimBullet
public class AimBullet extends HomingBullet
The AimBullet class is a subClass of the superClass BulletEntity. It represents a Bullet goes in a straight line to the last coordinates of the player

  • Constructor Details

    • AimBullet

      public AimBullet(String ImagePath, int damage, double movementSpeed, Weapon emiter, int shootAngle, SpaceEntity target)
      Constructor for the AimBullet class
      Parameters:
      ImagePath - Path to the image file representing the HomingBullet entity.
      damage - The quantity of damage received by the entity that it hits
      movementSpeed - Quantity of movement at each timestep.
      emiter - The entity that created the bullet.
      shootAngle - The angle that there is between the emiter and the direction the bullet face
      target - The SpaceEntity that this bullet will follow
